titleStmt.title: A letter to a friend concerning a postscript to the Defense of Dr. Sherlock's notion of the Trinity in unity, relating to the Calm and sober enquiry upon the same subject
titleStmt.author: Howe, John, 1630-1705.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by J. Astwood for Tho. Parkhurst ...,

notesStmt.note: Written by John Howe. Cf. NUC pre-1956.
